website_summaries.verdict: Offers more control over sliding and spins thanks to a 24-volt motor and simple controls and handles.
pros: Easy-to-use controls over the direction and speed of the trike
Larger rear wheels are more durable than simple casters
Has better traction overall compared to thinner rear-wheel sets
cons: Plastic rear wheels wear down more quickly over time than other brands

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like the fact that it doesn’t work. Doesn’t work at all. Charged it full but it’ll only work for few seconds and stop working. Would have to wait 30-60 seconds for it to work again only for seconds. I don’t like the fact that I have waste 1 hour to assemble it and now another hour to dissemble and Package it and another 20 minutes to go to UPS to return. Combine it with a disappointed 6 year old. It’s just bad QA on huffy’s part.
customer_reviews.author: Tejas Patel

customer_reviews.title: Waste
customer_reviews.text: It's a yard ornament for us right now. I would charge it over night and it still wouldn't run the next day. We actually gave it as a bday gift back in January. He might've rode it 3 or 4 times before it quit. I've tried charging but I think it's safe to say it was just a waste of money! We gave up on it
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: A little too big for my 9 year old son to reach pedals
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how many stars to give this. This seems to be a nice sturdy bike. My son just turned 9 and is one of the tallest in his class but he can barely reach the pedals so he can't pedal. I'm shocked this is too big for him it says age 8 and up. But he is really excited about it and he won't outgrow it for a long time. My husband is going to drill more holes to move the seat closer. I'll update after modification and my son is able to reach the pedals.
customer_reviews.author: Ah

customer_reviews.title: Great ride on for 53” or taller kids, lots of fun !
customer_reviews.text: This is a lot of fun for bigger kids. My 8 year old is 51 inches tall and can barely reach the pedals. I’d say 53” is the minimum to ride without stretching. It’s a lot of fun, easy to put together, well made. Kids love it, especially the spins. Seat adjusts, but with screws, not an easy peg/clamp/etc.
customer_reviews.author: richterd

customer_reviews.title: In my experience
customer_reviews.text: My kid loved riding it when it actually worked. I called huffy and described the problem. The person answered my question pretty quickly of the problem. Within a couple weeks part came .. There were a lot of wires but over all not very hard to assemble took me about 45 minutes to change the part out. Month later the machine is not working again. I give it two stars my kid likes it when it runs and it ran fine on pavement. we only had it since Christmas out playing with it . It has messed up 2 times . It is garage kept .
customer_reviews.author: Frequent shopper

customer_reviews.title: NOT for 8 year olds + be prepared to bruise your bum
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Fun for the adults My son loved the colors and look of it Cons: It flips over 8 out of 10 times...road rash! It was for my 8 year old, but the pedals were too far away. We moved seat all the way up and he still couldn't reach. We drilled 2 new holes and moved seat farther up and put a pillow behind him and he could finally reach, but now the bars ram into his legs every time he tries to turn...my son is the size of a typical 8 year old... This was the biggest santa fail ever. Ruined christmas
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but kids love them. The 9 yr old sits with the ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought two for the grandkids. My husband put them together, it took him all day, but kids love them. The 9 yr old sits with the seat adjusted all the way forward and can pedal, but the 5 year old had to have a pillow behind him to help him reach because he slides back in the seat. They should last them several years before they out grow them. Mom and Dad can ride them too!
customer_reviews.author: valerie presley

customer_reviews.title: Fun for kids and kids at heart
customer_reviews.text: Very fun to ride. Only problem is when you try to drift you tip over very easily, unless you turn your handles immediately the other direction once you start to drift. Other than that it’s very fun to ride and the kids big and medium love it. Our daughter is still a Litt to small to ride it. I would say teen and adult is perfect for this one
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary

customer_reviews.title: Good fun for all ages
customer_reviews.text: The kids love this. The first one we ordered had a broken piece when we went to assemble it, but Amazon customer service sent an exchange promptly upon reporting it. Easy to assemble. Fun for all ages - if they can reach the pedal, they can ride it!
customer_reviews.author: Andréa B.

customer_reviews.title: Battery charge doesn’t last long at all.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson’s birthday and I am very disappointed. The battery charge only lasted 10 to 15 minutes at the most. Not even enough time for him to learn how to drive it
customer_reviews.author: Nathan H.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old son loves it! Took my husband about 30 mins to put together. Since it has a 200lb weight limit, some adults may or may not have taken rides as well. So fun!
customer_reviews.author: Tracie Bechtel

customer_reviews.title: Such a disappoinment.  Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 12 year old son for Christmas. While it is sturdy and easy to assemble, it just doesn't work. Battery fully charged, it would only go 10 feet and then stop. Complete waste of money. Thank you Amazon for processing this return. Hint if you purchase this, keep your box - will make the return process easier. Wish I had read the reviews before purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Frank J. Lukanich III

customer_reviews.title: A summer must have for adults and children
customer_reviews.text: This was on my list for years. I had bought one in my college days and had a blast with my friends. Finally bought one for my kiddos and myself. It was a giant pain to put together. But it is so worth it. It shipped out fast and we got it within a few days. You will need an allen wrench, a few screwdrivers, an adjustable spanner and most likely a second person to help when you are putting it together.
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: Ths was ordered as a gift. She loved it and it was half the price that I saw it selling for at a local store.
customer_reviews.author: Vic

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my 9 year old at Christmas. Was easy to assembly. Totally worth the money! He's very active outside and this is a fun twist from a regular bike. For better visibility you should add a tall flag (not included) since the drift bike sits so low to the ground and can be hard for vehicles to see. As always, be safe and wear a helmet.
customer_reviews.author: John Whittington

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Putting this away for Christmas. We have been searching for a replacement for an original for a long time. Our special needs son cannot ride the ones with the lower back so we are so excited to have found this one. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Thank you Huffy so much😚
customer_reviews.text: WoooooooooooW!!!!!!!!! My son LOVES this thing.... He is autistic and afraid of bugs and never wants to go outside but this thing gets him to go outside. It has been such a pleasure to see him outside. Thank you Huffy for giving my son the outside back💗
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Inspect items or items before shipping
customer_reviews.text: Green machine. Missing wheel bolt. Bolt hole that holds the axle frame was too small so bolt could not slide in. Metal steering rods were black and front tire black not green like photo. Makes you wonder why manufacture would package an item that you ordered with problems like this. Inspect product before shipping that way I would not give you a bad review.
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old son loves his new green machine. Made very sturdy. Plastics on the front wheel came loose so we took them off but it looks better with out them anyways.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Tip over!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is not the green machine we grew up with. Riding on our driveway this morning (xmas) it tipped both my 10 year old and my husband. It does not skid it dumps you to the ground. Piece of junk!!!
customer_reviews.author: h.l.

customer_reviews.title: Durable and fun
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 8yr old for Christmas. He has no problems with it at all. Good quality and its survived so far 2 months of weekly use. It was a little awkward putting the front tire on, I'm sure there was an easier way. Thank you for a great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Great trike! Needs a tall kid.
customer_reviews.text: It’s pretty durable and easy to put together. But like a lot of other reviewers say, you need a tall kid to ride it. My ten year old Fourth grader can barely reach the pedals and he is tall for his age. I think 8+ is too young for this. But it is a great trike!!
customer_reviews.author: Musser

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun, great for young kids
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves this. Sturdy, well built and easy to put together. He’s 10 and average height but he had to set the seat on the most forward position to reach the pedals. So he should have this for a while before he grows out of it.
customer_reviews.author: RIRedd

customer_reviews.title: Not Recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Not recommended! It was fun when it actually worked. Only worked for about 3 weeks tops. Went back and read reviews on Amazon and Huffy and all have the same issues. Product doesn’t charge. Sending back for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: L. Mayer

customer_reviews.title: Not like they used to nake them in my day
customer_reviews.text: Not like my childhood green machine. Heavy metal parts, cannot spin out because it doesn't have the turn radius like back in the day (tips over instead) and the bucket seat is too small for older kids (9 yrs old)...hurts the hips.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie G.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Broke within a week and the new one is broke again
customer_reviews.author: melissa ramsay

customer_reviews.title: Over all good buy. My son loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Came scratched and scraped, box damaged. More than likely the delivery drivers fault though. Thankfully it was on the bottom so you cant see it. Got it for my sons bday and he loves it. Back tires are plastic so I'm sure they will wear down pretty quick, but works as described and easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product
customer_reviews.text: This product broke the first day. It was a birthday present for my son and after charging like reccomend my son was able to use it one time for 10 minutes after that it never turned back on. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: patrice barajas

customer_reviews.title: A score for Santa
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 9 yr old for Xmas. Easy to put together but use your own socket wrench. I was afraid he would be too big for it at 4’ and 60#. He still has room to grow and move the seat when he does. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fast and holds a 100+ 11 year old. Very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin J. Glynn

customer_reviews.title: Very dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: Upon assembly this particular green machine was useless .. it was ordered before July 22 2020 and to this day the machine has never operated at all .. defective 100% Amazon refunded my money and I just kept the machine .. maybe someday we can find someone to fix it ..
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: missing parts
customer_reviews.text: very disappointed with trying to assemble , missing parts .
customer_reviews.author: tonya

customer_reviews.title: Don't recomment this product
customer_reviews.text: Our 8 year old grandson cannot reach the pedal and it is not adjustable. The trike is not easy to maneuver, it requires a very big open space to use but spinning is limited due to the large width of the back wheels.
customer_reviews.author: theresa mathews

customer_reviews.title: Not as well made as advertised
customer_reviews.text: As a gift for my 8 year old grandson, I was excited as was he. Until the back tire started to constantly lose air. Did not notice til too late to complain or return. And it was an expensive purchase for me. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Puffcat

customer_reviews.title: assembly
customer_reviews.text: If you put this together by your self you will need some way to hold the front wheel while you insert the rear assembly. I used to jack stands. then it goes together well. All the holes match up well. I read some reviews that said they had problems matching up the holes. I did not.
customer_reviews.author: johnny sellers

customer_reviews.title: Regrets
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 8 yr old grandson. It hasn't held up and have had it less that 4 months . He is only here a few times a month and the tire has come off three times and cant keep count how many tires we have bought . a tube tire just doesn't hold up on a slider . bad idea. the first week it was a success but after that it sits. would not purchase again .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: it does not work! put together and have a very upset autistic child bc it won’t stay on more then 2 seconds! waiting on a replacement but is on back order!!! update replacement came and it doesn’t work!!! we went threw 3 of these!!!! nope!
customer_reviews.author: Pera

customer_reviews.title: Ok bike.
customer_reviews.text: The wheel is just a plastic image that fell off after twenty minutes of riding. The ones without that plastic wheel cover are cheaper. One bolt, main frame connection bolt is too long and doesn't tighten. Instructions supposed to be helpful but are not.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan OConnor

customer_reviews.title: Great toy.
customer_reviews.text: The trike seems to be well built and the kids have a ton of fun with it. The only problem is if the rider doesn’t lean into the turn hard enough the trike and rider can tip over.
customer_reviews.author: Ilona M Wiley

customer_reviews.title: was easy putting together
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, was easy putting together. My boys who are 100-130lbs love this! Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda watkins

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing why to big
customer_reviews.text: I got it for my grandson that is 7 for his birthday and it was why too big he will be lucky if he can ride it when he is 10 ...
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: Kids love this thing
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old and her cousins have a blast on this! Highly recommended. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Blanchfield

customer_reviews.title: Fun! Not easy to assemble, but fun!
customer_reviews.text: This is adult sized. My 8 year old is not able to reach the peddles yet, but parents can ride! Very study.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE THIS GREEN MACHINE IS HORRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd one that we bought for our grandson the 1st one only lasted for about a week before it would not turn on this one we took out of the Box put it together and it did not turn on at all so we had to put it back in the Box or return it not very easy to assemble very dissatisfied with the product never again
customer_reviews.author: deana

customer_reviews.title: Fun, and holds up well to abuse.
customer_reviews.text: Good updated design. I have a purple one that has more flexibility in the seat adjustment area, which is better for older kids, but this one works well for tall 7 year olds and up.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Roger

customer_reviews.title: Flat tire
customer_reviews.text: The front tire was flat when we got it. We have put air in it several times but it will not hold it.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Santa disappoints! Leave the box next time
customer_reviews.text: Santa brought this for the 95 pound child. Will not work in grass, pavement, or concrete. Total disappointment! Angry father and clueless mom who now hears about it daily as it sits in the carport. PS it won’t pull the cousin 55 pounds either
customer_reviews.author: CC in MS

customer_reviews.title: front tire a pain to change
customer_reviews.text: changing a flat tire in the front is time consuming-have to take everything apart to get the wheel off.
customer_reviews.author: Marielle Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Drifting fun!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great fun. This goes 12mph. It’s fast. Not for kids that get hurt easily. Helmet and protective gear is recommended. My son flipped it on the first day. Still loves it.
customer_reviews.author: T. Pfunder

customer_reviews.title: Unacceptable and awful
customer_reviews.text: This product is not worth the money! It ruined our Christmas morning with our nephew due to the poor quality of the tire. We had the whole bike assembled and went to put air in the tire and the tire would not hold air and kept coming off of the rim. This is UNACCEPTABLE for the price you are paying for this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My 10 yr old can barely reach the pedals. A bit of a learning curve with the steering.
customer_reviews.author: latergaters

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two for Christmas. Received two additional as replacements, but still could not get two functioning bikes from four because of broke/non-working parts. Asked for and received refund from Amazon. Quality is terrible and ruined two Christmas presents, don't waste your time.
customer_reviews.author: Apps

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Metal bike type frame. Wish it had a mount for a flag but great product, easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth buying.
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this, its a little big , but they can still use it.... I can even use it.... It's fun to take ta tennis court that's empty it slides better on the tennis court...
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: Fun at first, but then it falls apart. A piece of junk. Hardly used at all. The first one fell apart right from the start. Returned for another one. It fell apart. I put it to the curb. Second one fell apart as well. Too much of a hassle to take apart and ship back again. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: snooky

customer_reviews.title: Green huffy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson, easy to put together but it’s way too hard to push to make it go and he’s 9 and rode it 2 times and that’s it!!! I would not recommend this to any child that’s younger than him!! We have wasted $100 and we buy from y’all all the time !! Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Rose Ricks

customer_reviews.title: Cheapest out there....
customer_reviews.text: My grandson got this from me for Christmas....he hasn't stopped riding it since
customer_reviews.author: ewiz

customer_reviews.title: 100% what we were looking for
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as expected! 7yr old's Birthday gift was a huge hit!
customer_reviews.author: RoldanCastillo Family

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assembly
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and easy to put together, my grandsons Loves it.
customer_reviews.author: T. Luster

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my grandson. He loves it. However it isn’t worth the money. The arm/gear/handle keeps falling off. I definitely would NOT purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Debra A. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Everything is as expected. Best for kids 10 and up, or tall boys.
customer_reviews.author: M Wohlschlegel

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 15 yo son for Christmas. He loves it! He's 5'4" (I think) and weighs about 120. He and his friends have no issues riding this around and some are significantly bigger than he is. He hasn't had it out too much because of weather, but he enjoys it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica C.

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 11 year old grandson for Christmas. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: green machine dream
customer_reviews.text: cool drift bike...lil big for 8 year old but he has gotten use to it!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer 2020

customer_reviews.title: This bike is do much fun. Fits my 9 year old perfectly at the ...
customer_reviews.text: This bike is do much fun. Fits my 9 year old perfectly at the smallest setting. And when we move the seat back I can actually ride it. It's a blast.
customer_reviews.author: kayla n cahall

customer_reviews.title: Low seat hurts your back
customer_reviews.text: We ended up returning it because the seat back was so low it hurt my sons back. His friend has the older version with the tall seat so we got the older version. I love the newer versions brakes (2018) better than the older version but the seat was just too painful so we had to return it. Assembly was easy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Green Machine
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this! He zips all over the place in it!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth J. Dugger

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his green machine. He wants to ride it every chance he can get. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: B. L. Wyatt

customer_reviews.title: 6 year old LOVES This
customer_reviews.text: This bike has been enjoyed by children and adults. Wasn't the best design but suits its purpose. Inexpensive and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yes, would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble. Seat adjusts easily with two bolts. My nephew is 10yo and should be able to enjoy this for a few years as he grows.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Piepenbrink

customer_reviews.title: looks good,, my son is a little short
customer_reviews.text: looks good,, my son is a little short, 4'-4'' has trouble touching the pedals. seat needs to go up and inch or two.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hard to put together but worth the time
customer_reviews.text: My boy loves it! I found it somewhat hard to put together
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just like when I was a kid but the pneumatic tire is so much better
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L Cabbage

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: My son played with this for 4 days and it broke. Very disappointing since it was his birthday present.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer reed

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work as advertised
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t slide/skid as advertised. It keeps flipping over and my kids get hurt on the concrete. For $100 I wouldn’t purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No as they say for the age
customer_reviews.text: Not for a 8 years old and my grandson is tall
customer_reviews.author: gary lefkowitz

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Damaged, NO response yet regarding a replacement!!!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived damaged, clearly as seen in the photos the damage was done pre-shipping and pre-assemblyt. Wheel is cut, and the frame tubing is bent. Disappointing!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tsuyoi

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Works just as described and was very easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Jon M

customer_reviews.title: Great for grandkids
customer_reviews.text: Nice sturdy bike. Kids have alot of fun on it.
customer_reviews.author: MommaT

customer_reviews.title: Good exercise and tons of fun!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 5 of them for grandkids....my children had one back in the 80's so they were thrilled to have their children enjoy it too!
customer_reviews.author: Elaine E Detwiler

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this bike. My older daughter likes to ride it as well and she's 15. Sturdy and not too bad to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You’ll be a rockstar!
customer_reviews.text: All 3 of my kids adore this! They ride in our unfinished basement and burn off steam when it’s too cold to play outdoors. We can’t wait to bring it out this spring and summer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am disappointed with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed with this purchase. We have had this less than 2 months and the tire completely shredded.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: My son is 6 we thought he would be too small for it but loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Kinmartin

customer_reviews.title: Happy Grandson
customer_reviews.text: My grandson absolutely loves it. He has had so much fun on it
customer_reviews.author: kathy robinson

customer_reviews.title: Needs a better front tire and rim
customer_reviews.text: Front tire went flat after 2 days. Needs a better front tire and rim.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Lees

customer_reviews.title: Box mangled tire flat
customer_reviews.text: Box was beyond mangled but put the bike together and it looked in okay condition. Tire was also flat will need to pump it up before Xmas.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: The kids loved it! Both 12 year old and 15 year old were playing on it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Navarro

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: Came exactly as ordered and when expected, very sturdy and fun
customer_reviews.author: Debra Riggins

customer_reviews.title: kids love them and I mean kids of all
customer_reviews.text: kids love them and I mean kids of all ages
customer_reviews.author: Michael A.

customer_reviews.title: REAR WHEELS POORLY MADE
customer_reviews.text: One of the rear wheels split open after 1 hour of use. Replacement wheels very costly
customer_reviews.author: Mark S

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: Xmas gift for my son & he loves it! He loved this gift the most
customer_reviews.author: Latoya Miller

customer_reviews.title: I would of rated a solid 5 stars but when ...
customer_reviews.text: I would of rated a solid 5 stars but when I was taking one of the screws off it broke because it was screwed on too tight and it was a pain to get it out of the hole
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fun for kids!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my nephew and he loves riding it every chance he gets!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My Grandson who is a little gamer and hard to ...
customer_reviews.text: My Grandson who is a little gamer and hard to get him out to do things now considers himself a Daredevil with the Green Machine, he really enjoys this Green Machine
customer_reviews.author: Joe Juarez

customer_reviews.title: From a parent's view and experience it is sooooo much fun.
customer_reviews.text: Wanted it for my son that turned 12. He is too short for it, sooo i ride the thing. From a parent's view and experience it is sooooo much fun.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle cloud

customer_reviews.title: Got it put together!  Not as bad as I thought.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, works fine .... sure hope the grandson likes it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: K. moncrief

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loved his green machine. Very sturdy and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Theus Kaliontgis

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to assemble, and once assembled the screws kept ...
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to assemble, and once assembled the screws kept coming out. Went and put different type if screws in and now all is well.
customer_reviews.author: shirley barger

customer_reviews.title: The material is very cheap and the screws and bolts ...
customer_reviews.text: The material is very cheap and the screws and bolts came apart through the plastic after riding it one time.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Watson

product_meta.title: Huffy Green Machine
feature_bullets: Silver flake and lime paint; assembled size is 56" x 34" x 22"
Run time is approximately 30 minutes on a 12 hour charging cycle
Durable tubular steel frame; thumb operated push-button throttle and hand brake, batteries and charger included
Twin-stick controls and handbrake provide endless slide & spin fun; goes up to 12mph
Adjustable bucket seat to fit your child as they grow
